title: Advanced Analytics Integrated Education: Strengthening Managerial and Technical Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Learners experience blended learning combining managerial decision-making and analytical skills in smartphone-based limited-technology environments. Strengthened practical training using real business cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain data-driven decision-making processes and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can write reports solving business problems by combining statistical analysis tools with management theories.
Learners can implement and evaluate visualization techniques for effectively communicating analytical results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
